sqlMap.select: select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by authgrp_id) as rowno ,co_id as coId ,(select co_nm from tsys_company where co_id = a.co_id) as coNm ,authgrp_id as authgrpId ,authgrp_nm as authgrpNm ,authgrp_cd as authgrpCd ,case use_yn when '1' then '사용' else '미사용' end as useYn ,rmks_cts as rmksCts ,regpsn_id as regId ,to_char(reg_dtm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as regDt ,upd_id as updId ,to_char(upd_dtm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updDt from public.tsys_author_group a where co_id = #coId# and authgrp_nm like concat('%'||coalesce(#authgrpNm#,'')||'%') order by authgrp_id
